org.eclipse.wst.jsdt.chromium.debug.ui.actions

Class FileExtensionFilterAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.wst.jsdt.chromium.debug.ui.actions.FileExtensionFilterAdapter

  • public class FileExtensionFilterAdapter
extends java.lang.Object
    This action filter is used to test the file extension for ResourceMapping objects. To use it you must first declare it in your plugin.xml: Once that's done it may be used to filter as per the element in the following example:
